dependencies: ((SOC_MCIMX6X_M4 && SOC_SERIES_IMX_6X_M4) || CPU_HAS_FPU) (=n). See
http://docs.zephyrproject.org/latest/reference/kconfig/CONFIG_FPU.html and/or look up FPU in the
